title: AWS Lambda Microservices Handler
description: Implemented a serverless function on AWS Lambda to serve as a key handler within a distributed microservices architecture. This component processes incoming requests, routes them appropriately, and integrates with other services to fulfill specific business operations.

title: AI-Automated Next.js Portfolio
description: Developed a dynamic portfolio website leveraging Next.js for server-side rendering and efficient content delivery. The architecture integrates AI automation to streamline content generation and update processes, enhancing scalability.
impact: Reduced manual content update time by 70%.
